description: {"blocks":[{"key":"crm63","text":"This protocol was used to extract DNA from whole or parts of zooplanktonic freshwater crustaceans (Copepoda, Branchiopoda, ...) from New Caledonia.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: DNA, Extraction, crustacean, freshwater, PNDB, BOREA

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8j1oi","text":"Prepare your 96-well extraction plate with one individual per well. Alternate genus in the wells to detect eventual contamination between wells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4ni85","text":"Collect one individual from a sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8d859","text":"Note its genus and determine its sex with a binocular microscope","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f8lqb","text":"For big individuals (more than 5 mm), dissect a few legs and put it in the well. Be careful not to damage the rest of the body and put it in a tagged Eppendorf tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"der8k","text":"For little individuals (less than 5 mm), put the whole body.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4kt05","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"atra4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bu7ou","text":"If necessary, use alcool to get the biological material to fall at the bottom of the well","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"epp6","text":"When all 96 wells are filled, the biological material has to dry to go to lysis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cdv9g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jces","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"12pl4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"84mbo","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2fef5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fa80t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5hdi4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"rmav","text":" If necessary, use a micropipette to empty an excess of alcool in the well","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"safety","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6kg3q","text":"Make sure the plate is closed when you want to transport it elsewhere","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"23die","text":"Prepare the lysis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1o9d","text":"Mix   and   in a Multi-Channel Reservoir and distribute   with a multimicropipette in each well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":10,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5seh3","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"43j6b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"18","error":false,"guid":"01AE13502DC711ECAE61E5BB3B170C7B","id":0,"label":"T1 buffer","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2.5","error":false,"guid":"1EEF16D02DC711ECAE61E5BB3B170C7B","id":0,"label":"K proteinase","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"E73DC6902DC711ECAE61E5BB3B170C7B","id":0,"label":"of the mix","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":0},{"key":1,"length":1,"offset":7}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5q1qn","text":"   and   in each well","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"46d5v","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"amount":"180","error":false,"guid":"17FEBE502DC911ECAE61E5BB3B170C7B","id":0,"label":"T1 buffer","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"amount"},"1":{"data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"201842A02DC911ECAE61E5BB3B170C7B","id":0,"label":"K proteinase","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"amount"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4tvo4","text":"Close your extraction plate with a heated aluminium foil and an adhesive plastic film","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ariv3","text":"Put your plate in a proofer at      to lyse the tissues","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F17378122DC911EC9FDA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"56","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":0,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F17379832DC911EC9FDA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"(6h or more)","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"56","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5ja9d","text":"Perform the DNA extraction with a DNA extraction robot","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aa6dg","text":"Remove the adhesive film and aluminium foil from the plate and put it in the robot","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dpnbj","text":"It will deposit   and   in each wells and mix it","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":16,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ig43","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"78961C302DCA11ECAE61E5BB3B170C7B","id":0,"label":"BQ1 buffer","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"82A381402DCA11ECAE61E5BB3B170C7B","id":0,"label":"ethanol","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4t1ar","text":"Then,   are transfered on the tissue binding plate. Reagents excess are emptied in a waste container.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ei78u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"600","error":false,"guid":"A70D67802DCA11ECAE61E5BB3B170C7B","id":0,"label":"of the wells content (lysate, BQ1, ethanol)","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bouc2","text":"The tissue binding plate is then dried by a   aspiration to bind DNA to the silica membrane of the binding plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"C8B181902DCB11ECAE61E5BB3B170C7B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4cc89","text":"The silica membrane is then washed with   and twice with   per well. Each wash is intercalated by a   aspiration dry.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":57,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":100,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eb7fe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"600","error":false,"guid":"DB78906030DD11EC9D0FCB939925F950","id":0,"label":"BW buffer","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"900","error":false,"guid":"F55A635030DD11EC9D0FCB939925F950","id":0,"label":"B5 buffer","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"1A7B167030DE11EC9D0FCB939925F950","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d2c20","text":"The waste container is then removed from under the binding plate which is dried again by a   aspriration","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":91,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4dhvv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"482160B030DF11EC9D0FCB939925F950","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c9pln","text":"An empty extraction plate is placed under the binding plate to retrieve the genomic DNA from it","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6p5m0","text":"DNA is eluted from the tissue binding plate with   in each well and is collected in the new extraction plate underneath","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5cff9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"7D8BB1B030DF11EC9D0FCB939925F950","id":0,"label":"BE buffer","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"99b94","text":"After a   rest, the binding plate is dried for   and the elution is repeated with   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":47,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":82,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7ff9c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"B5EAD8B030DF11EC9D0FCB939925F950","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"D1FA611030DF11EC9D0FCB939925F950","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"061379F030E011EC9D0FCB939925F950","id":0,"label":"BE buffer","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"28d65","text":"Retrieve the new extraction plate containing the genomic DNA and discard the rest","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
